meanings.definition: The quality or state of being inclined to sleep.
meanings.sent1: The medication side effect caused extreme drowsinesses in the patient.
meanings.sent2: The cozy atmosphere of the room heightened the drowsinesses of the guests.
meanings.sent3: The drowsinesses after a big meal made him want to nap under the table.
meanings.sent4: The drowsinesses of the lazy Sunday afternoon lulled her into a peaceful nap.
meanings.sent5: The drowsinesses of the warm bed beckoned him to sleep in.
